keyValuePair.Value: %1s Capture %2s's Star %3s

In an interesting turn of events %1s has agreed to a move that will see %2s leave for %3s. It is unknown exactly what motivated the move and it has many wondering how this will affect the team in the long run.

In an interesting turn of events %1s has agreed to a move that will see %2s leave for %3s. It is unknown exactly what motivated the move and it has many wondering how this will affect the team in the long run.
Can %1s Live Without %2s?

%1s revealed his latest addition to the squad with %2s signing from %3s. With an estimated value of %5s, %1s stated "This player's going to be a huge success, he's sensational to watch." It is unclear however the impact this sale will have on %3s's overall chances this season. It's also yet to be seen if %4s has a replacement lined up.

%1s revealed her latest addition to the squad with %2s signing from %3s. With an estimated value of %5s, %1s stated "This player's going to be a huge success, he's sensational to watch." It is unclear however the impact this sale will have on %3s's overall chances this season. It's also yet to be seen if %4s has a replacement lined up.
%1s Star %2s Sold to %3s

%1s showed off his latest purchase %2s today. The manager simply added "I've managed to add a top quality player to add to the team sheet. I think any manager would be pleased with this purchase." %3s will be surely regretting this decision in games to come. The question on everyone's lips is can %4s cope without %2s?

%1s showed off her latest purchase %2s today. The manager simply added "I've managed to bag a top quality player to add to the team sheet. I think any manager would be pleased with this purchase." %3s will be surely regretting this decision in games to come. The question on everyone's lips is can %4s cope without %2s?
I know you will be eventually looking for a replacement %1s, but I think I can fill the role if you give me a chance.
I know you will be eventually looking for a replacement %1s, but I think I can fill the role if you give me a chance.
You're the man for the job
I'm sure you have what it takes to fill the %1s position in our starting lineup.
I'm sure you have what it takes to fill the %1s position in our starting lineup.
This is your chance
Before I commit to search for a replacement you'll have your chance to prove me that %1s's future was right in front of me all along.
You'll have to work hard to get there
You'll get your chance but don't expect to become a starting player overnight. You're going to have to work hard.
Is %1s ready to step in now?
The fans believe losing %1s is going to be a blow. But looking at the squad here at %2s, do you think that %3s could be ready to step up and fill that key position in the line-up?
It's up to the lad himself.

If you're asking me, I'd say yes. I think %1s can be a ready-made replacement for %2s. It's up to him to take his chance now. I think he's got everything he needs to become a big, big player for us at %3s.
He's got all the tools.
I know there are people wondering how we're going to be able to replace an important player like %1s. I'd just say: look at %3s. He's got all the qualities he needs to succeed as a %2s, I believe.
Is he ready to put in the hard work?
I'm not convinced we'll have to go into the market for a replacement for %2s. I'm going to give %1s his chance to prove he's got the ability and the work ethic to do that job for us now.
Can %1s replace %2s?
You've lost %1s and supporters are trying to figure out what that means for %3s. What are your plans now? Do you think %2s is ready to step in and take over that key position in the team?
I believe in the lad, definitely.
We've been keeping a close eye on %1s for a while now, and that was definitely factored in when we decided on the sale of %2s. I think the lad's got all the qualities to step into the role at %3s.
It's a challenge for him.
Everyone knows how important a player %2s has been for us. It'll be a challenge for %1s to prove he's ready to fill that position. But I think he's good enough, for sure. It's up to him now.
He'll need time to prove himself.

%1s was a bit of a hero here so it'll be difficult for anyone to replace him. But I believe in %2s. He's got a bit to learn and it'll take some time. But, if the fans are patient, the lad will prove he's up to the job.
%1s set to replace %2s

The sale of %1s to %2s caused a stir on the transfer market with pundits and fans alike questioning what is the next move for %3s? The mistery is now unveiled with %4s signing of %5s looking to fill in the gap left by %1s's departure.
%1s Finds Success Without %2s

It has been a positive season for %1s since the departure of %2s to %3s some time ago, and it seems that %4s can breathe more easily when considering the impact of playing without the one-time star man.
%1s Flourishes Without %2s
%1s have been relishing the success of their results. %2s is surely satisfied since most pundits and fans were sure that the loss of %3s would have caused a huge ripple in otherwise calm waters.
%1s have been relishing the success of their results. %2s is surely satisfied since most pundits and fans were sure that the loss of %3s would have caused a huge ripple in otherwise calm waters.
%1s Struggle to Make a Big Impression

Despite the efforts of the management and team it's clear that %1s are not where they want to be. It's clear that the departure of %2s has hit the club hard but many are left wondering if they can pick up and recover from their poor form.
Tough Times For %1s After %2s's Transfer Out

The road has been a long and bumpy one for %1s since the departure of %2s to %3s. It is obvious now %4s may have let %2s go a bit prematurely, as it seems that the loss of the star man has left his former team with a big hole to fill.

The league road has been a long and bumpy one for %1s since the departure of %2s to %3s. It is obvious now %4s may have let %2s go a bit prematurely, as it seems that the loss of the star man has left his former team with somewhat of a big hole to fill.
%2s Not Adjusting to Life at %1s

After a very media driven transfer, %1s has dwindled into the background of people's minds. With his form dipping many fans are left confused as to why %2s purchased him in the first place. It's obvious that %3s will be happy with their decision to sell the player with fans heard chanting "What a waste of money!" in regards to %1s's recent performances.
%2s Believes %1s Will Improve

No signs of improvement for %1s. %2s must feel like he has been robbed. "It may take a few more games before %3s gains some confidence again. One or two good performances can transform a players season. It's just a matter of time as to when they will come." were the words of an optimistic sounding manager.

No signs of improvement for %1s. %2s must feel like he has been robbed. "It may take a few more games before %3s gains some confidence again. One or two good performances can transform a players season it's just a matter of time as to when they will come" were the words of an optimistic sounding manager.
Has %1s Settled into the %2s Squad?

Fans haven't been overly impressed with their new signing since forking out %1s recently. When asked about his performances %2s simply replied "I don't want to let anyone down. The club and manager are behind me one hundred percent. If they weren't I wouldn't be here. It's just going to take a little more time."

The club and manager are behind me one hundred percent. If they weren't I wouldn't be here. It's just going to take a little more time."
How's %1s Doing at %2s?

Expectations are always high at a new club and since %1s's departure from %2s, his time under %3s has been somewhat uninspired. His recent performances have left fans and the %4s manager questioning the value of their new acquisition. "He's not doing what I imagined he would for the team," began one dejected %4s fan, "%2s can have him back if they want."

%1s Strives to Fit in at %2s

%1s has not given %2s the desired boost they wished for. With average performances he has struggled to shine the brightest amongst a team of well gelled players. "It's taken longer than I expected to adjust to my move, but I'm sure things will fall into place for me" added the %3s.
%1s Over the Moon With %2s Progress

Since the arrival of %1s to %2s fans have been relishing the delights of his ability. "He has proven to be an integral part of the team so far. I just hope he continues to impress" stated one excited fan. %3s added cheerfully "Well the fans seem happy. So if they are happy that usually means you've done something right!"

I just hope he continues to impress" stated one excited fan. %3s added cheerfully "Well the fans seem happy. So if they are happy that usually means you've done something right!"
%1s Shines at %2s

Most teams would love to see the back of certain players, however in %1s's case, this is not true. %2s has taken his career to a whole new level with a string of good performances for his new club. I'm sure %3s are ecstatic to have picked up the player for only %4s, which many football pundits would consider a steal for the performances he has put in recently.
%1s Hits the Ground Running
Since his departure from %1s some time ago, %2s has basked in a run of exceptional form that would probably leave %3s questioning the decision to let %4s join %5s.
Fans Question %1s Replacement

%1s were left with a tough task ahead of them after the loss of %2s. %3s's choice of acquiring %4s in his place was a topic for debate. However, the player's latest string of mediocre performances has left the fans wanting a higher calibre of player. "I think we deserve to have a top quality player come in and fill the role properly" stated one unhappy fan.

%1s Fills %2s's Boots

With the recent media spotlight on %1s since his departure from %2s, %3s had a tough decision to make. However, with the recent form of %4s, it's clear that %2s can see the light at the end of the tunnel.
%1s Steps Up

%1s left a big hole in %2s's team selection. But luckily for %3s, %4s stood up to the challenge. Since he was brought in to fill the %5s role, his progress has come on in leaps and bounds. I'm sure both the fans and manager alike are happy with the player's progress.
